subject: Cycling, Road
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: By the time Lance Armstrong’s teammate Christian Vande Velde hit his early 20s, cycling had taken a dark turn for him as a professional rider.
snippet: By the time Lance Armstrong’s teammate Christian Vande Velde hit his early 20s, cycling had taken a dark turn for him as a professional rider.
